Package io.permazen.kv.lmdb

KVDatabase implementation based on LMDB.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ByteArrayLMDBKVDatabase
    LMDBKVDatabase using byte[] arrays buffers.
    ByteArrayLMDBKVStore
    KVStore view of a LMDB transaction using byte[] array buffers.
    ByteArrayLMDBKVTransaction
    LMDBKVTransaction using byte[] arrays buffers.
    LMDBKVDatabase<T>
    KVDatabase view of an LMDB database.
    LMDBKVImplementation  
    LMDBKVImplementation.Config  
    LMDBKVStore<T>
    Straightforward KVStore view of a LMDB transaction.
    LMDBKVTransaction<T>
    LMDB transaction viewed as a KVTransaction.

Package io.permazen.kv.lmdb Description

KVDatabase implementation based on LMDB.
See Also:
LMDBKVDatabase, Lightning Memory-Mapped Database Manager (LMDB), Lightning Memory Database (LMDB) for Java
